name: bitcurator-cli

scripts.pkg:build: pkg -t node18-linux-x64 --out-dir release package.json && cd release && mv bitcurator-cli bitcurator-cli-linux
scripts.pkg:sign: cd release && rm -f bitcurator-cli-linux.sha256.asc && gpg --armor --clearsign --digest-algo SHA256 -u 1ACB8887 bitcurator-cli-linux.sha256 && rm bitcurator-cli-linux.sha256
scripts.pkg:nosign: npm run pkg:prep && npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:hash
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg:prep && npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:hash && npm run pkg:sign

author: Erik Kristensen <erik@erikkristensen.com>. Revised for BitCurator by Corey Forman and Kam Woods.
